show_name: Animation Kikō Marco Polo no Bōken (TV)
other_title: アニメーション紀行 マルコ・ポーロの冒険 (Japanese)
マルコ・ポーロの冒険 (Japanese)
plot: The story is based on the adventures of Marco Polo, a merchant from the Venetian republic, who embarks on a journey to Asia along with his father and uncle in the 13th century.
opening_theme: "Itsu no Hi ka Tabi Suru Mono yo" (いつの日か旅する者よ) by Kei Ogura
ending_theme: "Dare de mo Ii kara" by Kei Ogura
"Sore ga Yume Na" by Kei Ogura
